snippet: STARK--Solomon, beloved husband of the late Charlotte. Devoted father of Ronni Greenberg and Jane Stark Berger. Father-in-law of Bruce Greenberg and Stuart Berger. Loving grandfather of Carly, Adam, David and Courtney. Dear brother of Shirley Serchuk and Libby Brooks. Service 11am, Friday at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park St., Hackensack, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STARK--Solomon, beloved husband of the late Charlotte. Devoted father of Ronni Greenberg and Jane Stark Berger. Father-in-law of Bruce Greenberg and Stuart Berger.
